بسم الــلّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
براه لــرضة بن يزيد من أحد وعشرين دينرا
ونصف وثمن ونصف سدس مثاقيل
دفعها عنه فأبين فانيق بعد دخوله
إلى الفسطاط وهو ممّا عليه من خراج
أرضه الّتي زرع مثمون ميمون لها سنة
أربع وتسعين ومائة وكتب
في شهر رمضان من سنة أربع وتسعين

[In the name of God] the merciful and compassionate.
(This is) a quittance for Riḍa ibn Yazīd for twenty one dīnārs (This is) a quittance for Ridah ibn Yazid for 21 dīnārs
and a half and an eighth and half a sixth (i.e. a twelfth) of the mithqālī type and one half and one eighth and one half of one sixth (i.e. one twelfth) of the mithqālī type.
It ist confirmed that he paid them (and acquitted) himself (of it) after he entered It ist confirmed that he paid them (and acquitted) himself (of them) after he entered welche Fānīq für ihn bezahlt hat, nachdem er nach al-Fusṭāṭ gekommen war
al-Fusṭāṭ. This is what he owes of the ḵarāj tax on Fustat. This is what he owed as kharāj on
his land, as assessed in the year his land, the tax on the crops of which was fixed, in the year seines Landes, das eine vielversprechende Saat hat
19[4]. This was written one hundred and ninety [four]. It was written
in the month of Ramaḍān of the year one hundred and ninety in the month of Ramadan of the 194.
four.
